attributes.action: Outlaw 'Hobby Farms' They Produce No Food For The Nation
attributes.additional_details:
Outlaw 'Hobby Farms' They Produce No Food For The Nation

We import 40% of our food according to the Office Of National Statistics.

We do not have enough land under the plough to provide all the food for the nation without relying on outside sources, which in the near future probably will not be available to us due to rising populations and natural disasters.

There are far too many 'hobby farms' in this country producing no food at all for the nation. Some just breed ponies for profit.

We should outlaw all 'hobby farms' now before we have a huge famine looming on the horizon.

Let us get our agricultural industry in the best possible shape for this over populated island and every piece of land put under the plough and not given to property developers and 'hobby farms' buyers.

Vote for a law against 'hobby farms' and developers owning agricultural land.
